name: The House of E.
storyline:
Although David and Emma Adams are siblings, they grew apart in time. But when the news of Emma's disappearance reaches David, he decides to do whatever is in his power to find her. Seeing the hopelessness of the local PD, he decides to take the matter into his own hands.

The trail leads him to the old mansion owned by a mystery horror novelist, who, as it turns out, also vanished without a trace. Believing those disappearances are not a coincidence, David goes to the manor.

He ventures into the unknown...
summary: The House of E. is a story-driven puzzle game with horror elements and a creepy atmosphere.
